verses.verse: כִּי־ <WH3588> If יִמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> If [one] be found חָלָ֗ל <WH2491> slain בָּאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֤ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֙ לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> thee to possess נֹפֵ֖ל <WH5307> it lying בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> in the field לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not נוֹדַ֖ע <WH3045> [and] it be not known מִ֥י <WH4310> who הִכָּֽהוּ׃ <WH5221> who hath slain

וְיָצְא֥וּ <WH3318> shall come forth זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <WH2205> Then thy elders וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יךָ <WH8199> and thy judges וּמָדְדוּ֙ <WH4058> and they shall measure אֶל־ <WH413> to הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> unto the cities אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which סְבִיבֹ֥ת <WH5439> which [are] round about הֶחָלָֽל׃ <WH2491> him that is slain

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> shall be that הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> And it shall be [that] the city הַקְּרֹבָ֖ה <WH7138> [which is] next אֶל־ <WH413> to הֶחָלָ֑ל <WH2491> unto the slain man וְלָֽקְח֡וּ <WH3947> shall take זִקְנֵי֩ <WH2205> even the elders הָעִ֨יר <WH5892> of that city הַהִ֜וא <WH1931> he עֶגְלַ֣ת <WH5697> A heifer בָּקָ֗ר <WH1241> of the herd אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not עֻבַּד֙ <WH5647> which hath not been wrought with בָּ֔הּ אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and which לֹא־ <WH3808> has not מָשְׁכָ֖ה <WH4900> [and] which hath not drawn בְּעֹֽל׃ <WH5923> in the yoke

וְהוֹרִ֡דוּ <WH3381> shall bring down זִקְנֵי֩ <WH2205> And the elders הָעִ֨יר <WH5892> of that city הַהִ֤וא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעֶגְלָה֙ <WH5697> the heifer אֶל־ <WH413> to נַ֣חַל <WH5158> valley אֵיתָ֔ן <WH386> unto a rough אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> has not יֵעָבֵ֥ד <WH5647> which is neither eared בּ֖וֹ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִזָּרֵ֑עַ <WH2232> nor sown וְעָֽרְפוּ־ <WH6202> neck שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <WH5697> the heifer's בַּנָּֽחַל׃ <WH5158> there in the valley

וְנִגְּשׁ֣וּ <WH5066> shall come near הַכֹּהֲנִים֮ <WH3548> And the priests בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons לֵוִי֒ <WH3878> of Levi כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בָ֗ם בָּחַ֞ר <WH977> hath chosen יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> for them the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <WH8334> to minister וּלְבָרֵ֖ךְ <WH1288> unto him and to bless בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְעַל־ <WH5921> and by פִּיהֶ֥ם <WH6310> and by their word יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> and every רִ֥יב <WH7379> shall every controversy וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every נָֽגַע׃ <WH5061> and every stroke

וְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> All זִקְנֵי֙ <WH2205> And all the elders הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of that city הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> which הַקְּרֹבִ֖ים <WH7138> [that are] next אֶל־ <WH413> to הֶחָלָ֑ל <WH2491> unto the slain יִרְחֲצוּ֙ <WH7364> [man] shall wash אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעֶגְלָ֖ה <WH5697> over the heifer הָעֲרוּפָ֥ה <WH6202> that is beheaded בַנָּֽחַל׃ <WH5158> in the valley

וְעָנ֖וּ <WH6030> And they shall answer וְאָמְר֑וּ <WH559> and say יָדֵ֗ינוּ <WH3027> Our hands לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor [שָׁפְכָה כ] (שָֽׁפְכוּ֙ <WH8210> cast ק) אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֣ם <WH1818> this blood הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְעֵינֵ֖ינוּ <WH5869> neither have our eyes לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor רָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> seen

כַּפֵּר֩ <WH3722> Be merciful לְעַמְּךָ֨ <WH5971> unto thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom פָּדִ֙יתָ֙ <WH6299> whom thou hast redeemed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and lay דָּ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֔י <WH5355> not innocent בְּקֶ֖רֶב <WH7130> charge עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> unto thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel's וְנִכַּפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> shall be forgiven לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like הַדָּֽם׃ <WH1818> And the blood

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you תְּבַעֵ֛ר <WH1197> So shalt thou put away הַדָּ֥ם <WH1818> blood הַנָּקִ֖י <WH5355> the [guilt of] innocent מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> from among כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> you when thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which is] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> When thou goest forth לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to war עַל־ <WH5921> against אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> against thine enemies וּנְתָנ֞וֹ <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּיָדֶ֖ךָ <WH3027> them into thine hands וְשָׁבִ֥יתָ <WH7617> and thou hast taken שִׁבְיֽוֹ׃ <WH7617> take

וְרָאִיתָ֙ <WH7200> And seest בַּשִּׁבְיָ֔ה <WH7633> among the captives אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> woman יְפַת־ <WH3303> A beautiful תֹּ֑אַר <WH8389> be drawn וְחָשַׁקְתָּ֣ <WH2836> and hast a desire בָ֔הּ וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> unto her that thou wouldest have her לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to thy wife

וַהֲבֵאתָ֖הּ <WH935> Then thou shalt bring אֶל־ <WH413> about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> her home בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> to thine house וְגִלְּחָה֙ <WH1548> and she shall shave אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשָׁ֔הּ <WH7218> her head וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> and pare אֶת־ <WH853> צִפָּרְנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6856> her nails

וְהֵסִ֩ירָה֩ <WH5493> And she shall put אֶת־ <WH853> שִׂמְלַ֨ת <WH8071> the raiment שִׁבְיָ֜הּ <WH7633> captives מֵעָלֶ֗יהָ <WH5921> and וְיָֽשְׁבָה֙ <WH3427> from off her and shall remain בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> in thine house וּבָֽכְתָ֛ה <WH1058> and bewail אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֥יהָ <WH1> her father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמָּ֖הּ <WH517> and her mother יֶ֣רַח <WH3391> month יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> a full וְאַ֨חַר <WH310> and after כֵּ֜ן <WH3651> after that תָּב֤וֹא <WH935> that thou shalt go אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> about וּבְעַלְתָּ֔הּ <WH1167> archer וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> and she shall be thy wife

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> shall be if לֹ֧א <WH3808> are not חָפַ֣צְתָּ <WH2654> And it shall be if thou have no delight בָּ֗הּ וְשִׁלַּחְתָּהּ֙ <WH7971> in her then thou shalt let her go לְנַפְשָׁ֔הּ <WH5315> whither she will וּמָכֹ֥ר <WH4376> but thou shalt not sell לֹא־ <WH3808> not תִמְכְּרֶ֖נָּה <WH4376> her at all בַּכָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> for money לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִתְעַמֵּ֣ר <WH6014> thou shalt not make merchandise בָּ֔הּ תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of her because עִנִּיתָֽהּ׃ <WH6031> thou hast humbled ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תִהְיֶ֨יןָ <WH1961> has לְאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> If a man שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> have two נָשִׁ֗ים <WH802> wives הָאַחַ֤ת <WH259> one אֲהוּבָה֙ <WH157> beloved וְהָאַחַ֣ת <WH259> and another שְׂנוּאָ֔ה <WH8130> hated וְיָֽלְדוּ־ <WH3205> and they have born ל֣וֹ בָנִ֔ים <WH1121> him children הָאֲהוּבָ֖ה <WH157> [both] the beloved וְהַשְּׂנוּאָ֑ה <WH8130> and the hated וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> has הַבֵּ֥ן <WH1121> son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <WH1060> and [if] the firstborn לַשְּׂנִיאָֽה׃ <WH8146> be hers that was hated

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> has בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> Then it shall be when הַנְחִיל֣וֹ <WH5157> to inherit אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> he maketh his sons אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> has ל֑וֹ לֹ֣א <WH3808> hath he יוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> [that] which he hath [that] he may לְבַכֵּר֙ <WH1060> [which is indeed] the firstborn אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> not make the son הָ֣אֲהוּבָ֔ה <WH157> of the beloved עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before בֶן־ <WH1121> the son הַשְּׂנוּאָ֖ה <WH8130> of the hated הַבְּכֹֽר׃ <WH1060> is the firstborn

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּכֹ֨ר <WH1060> [for] the firstborn בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַשְּׂנוּאָ֜ה <WH8130> of the hated יַכִּ֗יר <WH5234> But he shall acknowledge לָ֤תֶת <WH5414> by giving לוֹ֙ פִּ֣י <WH6310> portion שְׁנַ֔יִם <WH8147> him a double בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he יִמָּצֵ֖א <WH4672> of all that he hath ל֑וֹ כִּי־ <WH3588> for הוּא֙ <WH1931> he רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> for he [is] the beginning אֹנ֔וֹ <WH202> of his strength ל֖וֹ מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> the right הַבְּכֹרָֽה׃ <WH1062> of the firstborn ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> has לְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> If a man בֵּ֚ן <WH1121> son סוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5637> have a stubborn וּמוֹרֶ֔ה <WH4784> and rebellious אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <WH369> even שֹׁמֵ֔עַ <WH8085> which will not obey בְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice אָבִ֖יו <WH1> of his father וּבְק֣וֹל <WH6963> or the voice אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> of his mother וְיִסְּר֣וּ <WH3256> and [that] when they have chastened אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> even יִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> him will not hearken אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וְתָ֥פְשׂוּ <WH8610> lay hold ב֖וֹ אָבִ֣יו <WH1> Then shall his father וְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> and his mother וְהוֹצִ֧יאוּ <WH3318> on him and bring him out אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> unto זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> unto the elders עִיר֖וֹ <WH5892> of his city וְאֶל־ <WH413> at שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> and unto the gate מְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> of his place

וְאָמְר֞וּ <WH559> And they shall say אֶל־ <WH413> to זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> unto the elders עִיר֗וֹ <WH5892> of his city בְּנֵ֤נוּ <WH1121> This our son זֶה֙ <WH2088> This סוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5637> [is] stubborn וּמֹרֶ֔ה <WH4784> and rebellious אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> will not שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> he will not obey בְּקֹלֵ֑נוּ <WH6963> our voice זוֹלֵ֖ל <WH2151> [he is] a glutton וְסֹבֵֽא׃ <WH5435> drink

וּ֠רְגָמֻהוּ <WH7275> shall stone כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> the men עִיר֤וֹ <WH5892> of his city בָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> him with stones וָמֵ֔ת <WH4191> that he die וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <WH1197> away הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> evil מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> from among וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> you and all Israel יִשְׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> shall hear וְיִרָֽאוּ׃ <WH3372> and fear ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> has committed בְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And if a man חֵ֛טְא <WH2399> have committed a sin מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> worthy of מָ֖וֶת <WH4194> death וְהוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> and he be to be put to death וְתָלִ֥יתָ <WH8518> and thou hang אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on עֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> him on a tree

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָלִ֨ין <WH3885> shall not remain all night נִבְלָת֜וֹ <WH5038> His body עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעֵ֗ץ <WH6086> upon the tree כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָב֤וֹר <WH6912> but thou shalt in any wise תִּקְבְּרֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH6912> bury בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> him that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> the same כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קִלְלַ֥ת <WH7045> [is] accursed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> thy God תָּל֑וּי <WH8518> (for he that is hanged וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> be not תְטַמֵּא֙ <WH2930> be not defiled אֶת־ <WH853> אַדְמָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH127> your land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> your God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance ס
